p: Histological examination of limited numbers of mosquitoes infected with QML16 and QML22 supported the above results. (Fig. 2). Disseminated virus infection was observed in 88% ( n = 25) mosquitoes ≥ 10 days after feeding on QML16 and infection was observed in 50% ( n = 6) of the salivary glands of these insects. In contrast, no dissemination of virus could be detected beyond the midgut in any mosquitoes ≥ 10 days after feeding on QML22 ( n = 13).
